zkpInfo.title: What is Zero-Knowledge Proof?
zkpInfo.description1: Zero-Knowledge Proof technology allows you to prove certain facts about your identity without revealing any sensitive personal information.
zkpInfo.description2: For example, you can prove you are of legal voting age without revealing your exact birthdate, or prove you are a citizen without sharing your ID number.

credential.title: Enter Your Credential
credential.description: Upload your credential file to verify your identity using Zero-Knowledge Proofs. Your personal information remains private while your identity is verified.

requirements.title: File Requirements:
requirements.item1: Upload a Verifiable Credential JSON file
requirements.item2: The file must contain a zero-knowledge proof generated with your Costa Rican Firma Digital
requirements.item3: The credential must include both cryptographic proof and public signals for verification
requirements.item4: If you don't have a credential file, you can generate one through the authentication process
